WorkItem.Description: Add ability to specify "vertical" alignment of a text inside the cell.
WorkItem.Summary: Add ability to specify "vertical" alignment of a text inside the cell.

Comments.Message:
You have two options for this.  

1) You can add support for this yourself, which is fine as long as you only ship it with your product.  It should be fairly straitforward to do inside DataGridTextColumn.
2) You can use DataGridTemplateColumn like this:
                <dg:DataGridTemplateColumn>
                    <dg:DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate>
                        <DataTemplate>
                            <TextBox VerticalAlignment="Bottom" Text="{Binding Name}" />    
                        </DataTemplate>
                    </dg:DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate>
                    <dg:DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate>
                        <DataTemplate>
                            <TextBlock VerticalAlignment="Bottom" Text="{Binding Name}" />
                        </DataTemplate>
                    </dg:DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate>
                </dg:DataGridTemplateColumn>

Hope that helps.
